message: Hello. My name is Alex. Thank you for reaching out to PlaySure Gaming. How can I assist you today?
Hi, I just deposited a large amount, and now my account is restricted. Can you tell me what's going on?
I completely understand your concern. Let’s run through security so I can assist you better. Can you confirm your name, email, and also confirm your date of birth?
Sure, my name is Sarah Johnson, my email is sarah.j@example.com, and my date of birth is March 5, 1990.

Thanks, Sarah. That's all correct! Your account has been temporarily restricted as part of our anti money laundering checks, which are required to comply with regulatory guidelines. We need additional documents to verify your recent deposit.
What documents do you need from me?

To lift the restriction, please provide a government-issued ID, a recent utility bill confirming your address, and proof of the source of funds, such as a bank statement or payslip. You can upload these via your account portal under the 'Verification' section.
Alright, I’ll get those documents uploaded soon. How long will the review take?

Once your documents are uploaded, our verification team will review them within 24-48 hours. You'll receive an email confirmation once the review is complete. Would you like me to guide you through the upload process?
No, I think I can do it myself. Thanks for your help!
You're very welcome, Sarah! I'm glad I was able to help. If you need any further assistance, feel free to reach out. Have a great day!
